channel.title: Reactive on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Reactive on Arrans github.io

item.title: streamich/json-joy
item.description: json-joy is a library that implements cutting-edge real-time and collaborative editing algorithms and utilities for JSON data models, with a focus on developing the JSON CRDT (Conflict-free Replicated Data Type) specification and implementation.

item.title: simolus3/drift
item.description: Drift is an easy to use, reactive, typesafe persistence library for Dart & Flutter.

item.title: ThreeDotsLabs/watermill
item.description: Building event-driven applications the easy way in Go.
